docs.text: Some basic information of Security added
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Cryptography could be divided into Symmetric and Asymmetric (or public key) cryptography. Symmetric cryptography is further divided as Block and Stream cipher. Block cipher: Works on blocks of data and slower than stream cipher. It uses math operations such as Substituition and Transposition of elements E.g. DES, 3DES, AES Stream cipher: Works on stream of data either 1 bit or 8 bit and is much faster
docs.title: Cryptography_Basics
